code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import MarketCard from'../components/MarketCard';import Header from'../components/Header';import MarketOverview from'../components/MarketOverview';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const[coins,setCoins]=useState([]);const[stats,setStats]=useState({});const[search,setSearch]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{axios.get('https://crypto-exchange-backend-yd8j.onrender.com/api/market').then(res=>{setCoins(res.data.coins);setStats({total_market_cap:res.data.total_market_cap,total_volume:res.data.total_volume,btc_dominance:res.data.btc_dominance});}).catch(err=>console.error('Market fetch error:',err));},[]);const filtered=coins.filter(c=>c.name.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())||c.symbol.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{paddingBottom:70},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{searchTerm:search,onSearchChange:e=>setSearch(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MarketOverview,{stats:stats}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'grid',gap:'12px',padding:'12px',gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr))'},children:filtered.map(coin=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MarketCard,{coin:coin},coin.id))})]});}
